content.description: Start with both hands on hollow underclings. Pull up to a very prickly right hand blob and then up to pockets and the top. Some loose feet down low, needs some traffic but still a good line.
content.location: On the right side of the wall that faces into the canyon.Right of Karma.

content.description: Go up the small wall in the back of the Karma alcove with horizontal cracks and maybe a large pocket.
content.location: The wall in the back of the Karma alcove.

content.description: The obvious line up the overhanging flat prow on the right side of the alcove. Start with both hands in the horizontal crack between the lower boulder and the upper prow. Reach up and left to a shallow pocket. Heel hook and Slap up to the lip and then go left to a jug and then to the top on more good holds. A direct finish is also possible, maybe a bit easier. Going right and then up the corner and then finishing on the direct line is easier, maybe V4/V5.

Start with both hands on the loaf at chest height. Go straight up the wall on good holds at the start and finish boldly past weird, sharp ripples that all face the wrong way. A bit tall and sharp but solid and pretty good. For full value resist the urge to go out left near the top and instead go straight over.
content.location: To the right of Razorblade Halloween on the wall facing up canyon.

content.description: Stand start on a large horizontal created between the pedestal and the boulder. Pull on and move up right hand before reaching far left to a pocket then continue up on shallow pockets up a neat overhanging face. Make a few more hard moves up to awful slopers, then squirm your way up and on top of the boulder avoiding the rock behind.
content.protection: A few pads and a spotter. Landing is a bit uneven. It could be worse though.
content.location: Just left of "Karma on the same boulder inside the cave.
